title: List of books

properties.name: description
properties.value: This list of books contains an alphabetically organised assortment of various objects which can be placed in one's inventory and/or read. Most of the quest-related books are made available in the bookcase of a player-owned house.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:List of texts and tomes

This list of books contains an alphabetically organised assortment of various objects which can be placed in one's inventory and/or read. Most of the quest-related books are made available in the bookcase of a player-owned house.

Jump to
